title: Where Is Olivia?
description: Where Is Olivia? picks up where The Disappearance of Olivia left off. Olivia Franklin is the biological daughter of Princess Diana and Prince Charles, born before Prince William. Her life has been in danger ever since her true identity had been discovered. Olivia now finds herself living in Palm Beach, Florida, with her identity hidden. She is working as a governess for John Bradford Verner’s 7 year old son Miles. John is Eddie Armstrong’s brother in law. Now another assassin is in hot pursuit. The drama plays out in the most thrilling heart stopping and pivoting story with a surprise ending. Olivia has been running and hiding too long. With Miles’ life in danger, she will risk her own life to save his.
author: Nancy E. Ryan
